GComponent

public GComponent(processing.core.PApplet theApplet,
                  int colorScheme,
                  int fontScheme,
                  int x,
                  int y)
This method should be called by the ctor of any child class e.g. GPanel, GLabel etc. Only create the GScheme the first time it is called.
